metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49344 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Temporary data passed between application components by Budgie ExtrasWindow Shuffler applet could potentially be viewed or manipulated. The datais stored in a location that is accessible to any user who has local accessto the system. Attackers may pre-create and control this file to presentfalse information to users or deny access to the application and panel.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

budgie-app-launcher-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-applications-menu-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-brightness-controller-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-clockworks-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-countdown-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-dropby-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-extras-common - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-extras-daemon - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-fuzzyclock-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-hotcorners-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-kangaroo-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-keyboard-autoswitch-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-network-manager-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-previews - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-previews-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-quickchar - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-quicknote-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-recentlyused-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-rotation-lock-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-showtime-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-takeabreak-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-trash-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-visualspace-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-wallstreet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-weathershow-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-window-shuffler - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-workspace-stopwatch-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
budgie-workspace-wallpaper-applet - 1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: budgie-extras package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-1ubuntu3.1').
